typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SK_activityid as integer,
		activitytype as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		BK_activityid as string,
		ownerid as string,
		regardingid as string,
		duration as integer,
		modifiedon as timestamp,
		priority as integer,
		status as integer,
		duedate as timestamp,
		direction as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> STGActivities
source(output(
		SK_activityid as integer,
		activitytype as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		ownerid as integer,
		duration as integer,
		modifiedon as timestamp,
		priority as integer,
		status as integer,
		duedate as timestamp,
		direction as boolean,
		regardinglead as integer,
		regardingopportunity as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DWHActivities
STGActivities derive(HASHSTG = crc32(512,upper(toString(ownerid)),toString(status),toString(duedate),toString(priority),toString(duration),toString(modifiedon),toString(activitytype))) ~> HASHSTG
HASHSTG, DWHActivities lookup(STGActivities@SK_activityid == DWHActivities@SK_activityid,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 split(isNull(DWHActivities@HASHKEY),
	HASHSTG!=DWHActivities@HASHKEY,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Nuevos, Actualizaciones, Nada)
ConditionalSplit1@Nuevos sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SK_activityid as integer,
		activitytype as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		ownerid as integer,
		duration as integer,
		modifiedon as timestamp,
		priority as integer,
		status as integer,
		duedate as timestamp,
		direction as boolean,
		regardinglead as integer,
		regardingopportunity as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> Nuevo
ConditionalSplit1@Actualizaciones sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SK_activityid as integer,
		activitytype as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		ownerid as integer,
		duration as integer,
		modifiedon as timestamp,
		priority as integer,
		status as integer,
		duedate as timestamp,
		direction as boolean,
		regardinglead as integer,
		regardingopportunity as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> Actualiza
